General.Name: Shandong Homey Aquatic Development Co Ltd
General.Description: Shandong Homey Aquatic Development Co.,Ltd. operates in marine food industry in China. It offers kelp, seaweed, shellfish, fish, shrimp, jellyfish, and other products, as well as instant fresh and light-dried sea cucumber, sea cucumber puree and soft capsules, sea cucumber oral liquid and coffee, and sea cucumber ointments. The company also provides functional marine food, marine health, and pharmaceutical products. It sells its products through approximately 400 retail chain stores and supermarkets, as well as e-commerce platforms and TV shopping channels. The company was founded in 1993 and is based in Rongcheng, China.

2.Name: Mr. Jun Feng Li
2.Title: Deputy GM, Sec. of the Board of Directors & Director
